department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
short_summary: Procurement of an X-ray baggage inspection system for the Service correctionnel du Canada. The system will be located in Ste. Anne-des-Plaines Quebec. The bid submission deadline is February 21, 2023. The contract value will be determined as per the bid submission.
description: Acquisition, delivery and installation of an X ray baggage inspection system located in Ste. Anne-des-Plaines Quebec. This request for proposal (RFP) will be used to procure the system as outlined in Annex A.
duration_in_months: We will not be awarding any further contracts on this project as it has already been closed.
tags: Procurement of goods, Government of Canada, Public Services and Procurement Canada, Service correctionnel du Canada.
